title: Is there any news about adding an updated version of face unlock to Pixels 1-3? Miss it a lot.
content: I want to have face unlock back on my Pixel 3. I have tried everything to get it back, even installed the apk but it won't reappear in Smart Lock. At least tell me there is something in the works to put it back? Or at the very least just put it back and add a disclaimer about security?
